data.name: To Do List
data.description:
A friend of mine wants help managing their 'to do list' and I have said we on Codewars can assist. 

Input:
Two strings will be provided.
The first is the existing 'To do list'. 
The second is a list of the additions and subtractions to be made from that list, indicated with a '-' or '+' sign corresponding to completed and new tasks.

Output:
The output will be an updated 'to do list' in string format.

Requirements:
- If a completed task was never on the list, ignore it.
- No repeats on the 'to do list'
- The new list is to be ordered the same as the original list.
- New tasks are to be added to the end of the list.

Example:
toDoList("To do list: make dinner, go for a run, book driving test, call bank, call mum", "-make dinner, +go to the doctors, -book driving test") // "To do list: go for a run, book driving test, call bank, call mum, go to the doctors"
